category: On-Chain Indicators - Network Activity Metrics (Economic Activity)

indicators.name: Active Addresses (24h)
indicators.description: Number of unique addresses active in sending/receiving transactions over 24 hours

indicators.name: Active Addresses (7-day MA)
indicators.description: 7-day moving average of unique active addresses to smooth short-term volatility

indicators.name: New Addresses Created
indicators.description: Number of new unique addresses appearing on the blockchain per day

indicators.name: Zero-Balance Addresses
indicators.description: Addresses that have been emptied, indicating potential sell pressure or exchange flows

indicators.name: Addresses with Balance >$1
indicators.description: Number of economically significant addresses holding more than $1 USD equivalent

metadata.notes: All 30 Q&A pairs generated via MCP conversation with Gemini 2.5-pro. Content includes 2024-2025 market context (post-halving, post-ETF approval), trading strategies, limitations, and integration with complementary metrics.

qa_pairs.question: What are Active Addresses (24h) in cryptocurrency networks and why are they important metrics for blockchain analysis?
